title: Installing Binaries with Cargo Install
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use the cargo install command to install binary crates locally and make them runnable by adding the installation directory to your $PATH.

meta.title: Installing Binaries with Cargo Install | Rust Programming
meta.description: Learn how to use the cargo install command to install binary crates locally and make them runnable in Rust programming.
meta.keywords: Rust, Cargo, Binary Crates, Installation, Programming
